details.sectionContent: In this workshop, participants will be taught how to make a Bluetooth speaker.

A workshop in which participants will be taught how to make a Bluetooth speaker. Also, a technical seminar will be conducted at the start of workshop briefing participants regarding the workshop and some technical aspects of designing a Bluetooth speaker. Participants will also taught be PCB design along with basics like soldering.

What will you learn from this workshop:
‣	How to design PCB
‣	Technical description of a Bluetooth speaker and its components
‣	How to do soldering
‣	Troubleshooting.
Participants will be given a Take Away Kit
Electrical Seminar Hall on 5th Feb @ 10:45 am
